Security & Access Control.action: Disable root API keys; enable root account MFA; create break-glass procedure only.
Review Admin policy attachments; require approvals; monitor access key creations.
Require MFA for AssumeRole; enforce conditional IAM; add session policy checks.
Block StopLogging with SCP; alert on attempts; verify CloudTrail is multi-region & immutable.
Scope KMS key IAM; add CMK key policies; monitor decrypt rates & IP reputation.

Backend & Workflow Automation.action: Alert on bursts; correlate with write ops; fix failing automation jobs.

AI / NLP Processing.action: Enforce default encryption & bucket policies; require approvals for delete/write in sensitive buckets.
Tag buckets with data classifications; add anomaly detection on GetObject spikes.
